thread.title: Helen Bailey murderer Ian Stewart jailed for 34 years
thread.title_full: Helen Bailey murderer Ian Stewart jailed for 34 years

title: Helen Bailey murderer Ian Stewart jailed for 34 years
text:
Helen Bailey murderer Ian Stewart jailed for 34 years 23 February 2017 Image copyright SBNA Image caption Ian Stewart drugged and suffocated Helen Bailey The fiance of children's author Helen Bailey, who murdered her and dumped her body in a cesspit, has been jailed for 34 years. 
Ian Stewart, 56, secretly drugged and suffocated Ms Bailey in a plot to inherit her near-Â£4m fortune. Her body was found under the home she shared in Royston, Hertfordshire. 
"Cold and calculating narcissist" Stewart was found guilty of murder at St Albans Crown Court. 
He has been handed a life sentence.
